characters: Cyclist, car ahead, car on the right
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road at night. A cyclist is seen on the left side of the road, moving forward. Several cars are ahead, and a car on the right is attempting to merge into the lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed to navigate through the busy road. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the cyclist on the left and the cars ahead. The car on the right is attempting to merge into the lane, causing the self-driving vehicle to be cautious and maintain its lane.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving forward. 2) Front: Several cars, approximately 10 meters away, moving slowly. 3) Right side: A car, approximately 3 meters away, attempting to merge into the lane.

characters: Driver of a red sedan, pedestrian
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving in a parking lot. A red sedan is parked on the left side of the lane. A pedestrian is walking in the middle of the lane, moving from left to right.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is moving slowly through the parking lot, maintaining a steady speed to navigate around parked cars and pedestrians.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A red sedan, approximately 5 meters away, parked and stationary. 2) Front: A pedestrian, approximately 10 meters away, walking from left to right, potentially crossing the vehicles path.
